pullRequest.title: feat(plugins): Add extension point to append to exception messages delivered to end-users
pullRequest.bodyText:
Primarily this introduces the UserMessage extension point and the UserMessageService platform component.
Related:

spinnaker/fiat#781
spinnaker/clouddriver#4929

nodes.bodyText: Also moved this to kork-api.  I think we should migrate all of kork-exceptions to kork-api.  I know we have plugins that pull in kork-exceptions, so all the more reason to get ahead of this and do it soon.

This code was lifted and shifted from ExceptionSummary to this service ExceptionSummaryService.  The main difference here is that we build the user message via the UserMessageService.
This is a breaking change and there will be a corresponding CloudDriver PR.
